LanguageData.Bullet_DMS_AMR.label: Heavy rifle bullet
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_MiniMachineGun.label: Riot machinegun bullet
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_RiotRevolver.label: 20 gauge beanbag
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_RiotShotgun.label: 4 gauge bean bag
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.label: Elephant Gun
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.description: Single-shot high caliber heavy hunting rifle. While made to hunt giant game or stop a large hostile lifeform with sheer kinetic energy, it is also used by early industrial colonies against mechanoids thanks to its simple manufacturing requirements.
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.tools.barrel-0.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.tools.barrel-1.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: elephant rifle
LanguageData.DMS_KnuckledusterRevolver.label: Knuckleduster Revolver
LanguageData.DMS_KnuckledusterRevolver.description: Miniature self-defense weapon commonly found on midworlds, it barely takes up any space when folded. Accepts multiple calibers and may also used as a knuckleduster in a pinch.
LanguageData.DMS_MiniMachineGun.label: Riot LMG
LanguageData.DMS_MiniMachineGun.description: Pistol caliber machinegun designed for colony defense. It can chop down unarmored enemy hordes and prisoner riots with ease.
LanguageData.DMS_MiniMachineGun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_MiniMachineGun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.label: Riot Revolver
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.description: A double-action revolver designed to load shotgun ammo. It was pursposefully designed as a Personal Defense Weapon for rear echelon personnel but soon became an optional weapon for frontline mech solders because it can be used against most enemy types encountered in the field.
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.tools.barrel-0.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.tools.barrel-1.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Riot Revolver
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.label: Rifled Slug Shotgun
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.description: A high caliber rifled shotgun manufactured with stamped components, designed for anti-riot operations and disabling hostile mech units.
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.tools.stock-0.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.tools.barrel-0.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.tools.stock-1.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.tools.barrel-1.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: slug gun
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.label: Survival Rifle
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.description: Foldable rifle issued to vehicle crew members for self-defense in case it is needed. Accepts multiple common calibers.
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.tools.stock-0.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.tools.barrel-0.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.tools.stock-1.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.tools.barrel-1.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: survival rifle
